#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	string s,t;
	cin>>s;
	int flag=0;
	for(int i=0;i<=s.length()/2;i++)
	{
	if(s[i]!=s[s.length()-i-1])
	flag=1;
	}
	if(!flag)
	cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		
	}
}
